web_snippets: Chris Satchell ... Chris joined CD&R in 2020. Prior to CD&R, he spent twenty-five years in software and technology industries spanning five different CXO roles.
Chris Satchell General Information. Biography. Mr. Chris Satchell serves as Managing Director, Technology at Clayton, Dubilier & Rice. He joined CD&R in ...
After decades leading at Nike, Comcast, and Microsoft, Chris Satchell knew how to own a transformation—end to end. But when he joined CD&R, everything changed.
